entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 9:46PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG... Patchy dense fog is expected at times as a cold front moves southward. Local visibilities less than 1 mile can be expected. Fog conditions may begin improving after 1 AM. Motorists should remain alert for sudden changes in visibility, especially in low spots and near marshes, rivers, creeks or lakes.

entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued February 27 at 4:04PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...RAIN AND SNOW MELT WILL RESULT IN RISES ON SMALL STREAMS AND RIVERS IN PARTS OF EASTERN WASHINGTON AND NORTH IDAHO BY MID WEEK...
